focus.title: Stay Focused
focus.description: Define the principles that guide your decisions and keep you aligned with your values.

consistency.title: Build Consistency
consistency.description: Apply your rules regularly and develop lasting habits that shape your life.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Monitor your adherence to your rules and celebrate your wins along the way.

adapt.description: Regularly evaluate your rules and refine them based on what you learn about yourself.

step1.title: Create Your Rules
step1.description: Write down the rules that represent the person you want to become. Be precise and intentional.

step2.title: Set Your Goals
step2.description: Establish milestones and track events related to your rules. Make them measurable.

step3.title: Track and Trace
step3.description: Record your progress and stay accountable. See your commitment transform into concrete results.
